2993.verse: فَلَمَّا|Then when|93|104|141$تَرَٲٓءَا|saw each other|123|146|12941$ٱلْجَمْعَانِ|the two hosts,|118|141|3419$قَالَ|said|52|75|309$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(the) companions|136|159|409$مُوسَىٰٓ|(of) Musa,|89|100|499$إِنَّا|"Indeed, we|99|278|120$لَمُدْرَكُونَ|(are) surely to be overtaken."|218|397|12942$

3000.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|114|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|118|586$لَهُوَ|surely He|81|112|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|176|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|156|398$

3002.verse: إِذْ|When|57|70|1198$قَالَ|he said|67|92|309$لِأَبِيهِ|to his father|102|127|5737$وَقَوْمِهِۦ|and his people,|120|145|11823$مَا|"What|60|85|262$تَعْبُدُونَ|(do) you worship?"|144|156|1216$

3011.verse: وَٱلَّذِى|And the One Who|137|175|6481$هُوَ|[He]|49|125|298$يُطْعِمُنِى|gives me food|112|188|12961$وَيَسْقِينِ|and gives me drink.|148|186|12962$

3013.verse: وَٱلَّذِى|And the One Who|137|169|6481$يُمِيتُنِى|will cause me to die|151|215|12965$ثُمَّ|then|50|114|293$يُحْيِينِ|he will give me life,|146|178|12966$

3014.verse: وَٱلَّذِىٓ|And the One Who -|149|156|6481$أَطْمَعُ|I hope|73|86|12967$أَن|that|48|61|655$يَغْفِرَ|He will forgive|112|125|12928$لِى|for me|62|75|1351$خَطِيٓــَٔتِى|my faults|98|111|12968$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|112|1057$ٱلدِّينِ|(of) the Judgment.|145|145|11$

2993.verse: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"

2994.verse: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."

2995.verse: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.

2996.verse: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.

2997.verse: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.

2999.verse: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3000.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

3001.verse: And recite to them the news of Abraham,

3002.verse: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"

3003.verse: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."

3004.verse: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?

3005.verse: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"

3006.verse: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."

3007.verse: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,

3009.verse: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,

3010.verse: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.

3011.verse: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.

3012.verse: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me

3013.verse: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life

3014.verse: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."

3015.verse: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
